Devan Flanders injured but 8000 expected for Napier Super Rugby match https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/devan-flanders-injured-but-8000-xexped-for-napier-napier-napier-super-super-matper-match/fm6atdios5buhmmia6gxwcc4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/devan-flanders-injured-but-8000-xexped-for-napier-napier-napier-super-super-matper-match/fm6atdios5buhmmia6gxwcc4/ Doug LaingThe last Super Rugby game in Napier attracted 9226 fans. Can the Bay beat that next week? Wed, 12 Feb 2025 03:45:46 +0000 Devan Flanders up high against the Chiefs in Super Rugby last year. He suffered a leg injury at Hurricanes training last week and is expected to be out of the start of the new season, including the February 22 match in front of his home Hawke's Bay crowd in Napier. Photo / Photo / Photosport
